title: Looks like a modified PT Sans but...
content:
Hey guys. I'm looking for the font on the attachment, I did find it looks like pt sans bold italic but I'm not sure. If you know the name of the font can you please post it? Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Fit-.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420005411/http:/typophile.com/files/Fit-.jpg) | 40.68 KB |
author: EyeofCharon

comments.content: Don't know this one and really doubt it could be a font actually, more a custom logo work. If you need the 3 letters only, I suggest you to recreate them. You could start from any generic sans of your own simply reworking top left angles or redraw it from scratch as it is only made with strokes. Start upright, shear it to match you sample and round angles. That should be even quicker than waiting for someone to identify it.
Thanks Ryuk, it was exactly what I did.
